subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=177|rad=革|as=05|sn=14|canj=TJHVO|four=|ids=⿰革瓜}}

# (non-classical form of [[鞄]]) to tan and soften leather
# (same as [[匏]]) a bottle-gourd
# one of the eight kinds of musical sounds
# a kind of musical instrument
# (interchangeable [[枹]]) a drum-stick (interchangeable [[包]]) handbag or purse (especially one made of leather)
